content:
Thank you so much for your kind words and wisdom! You're absolutely right, rest and recovery are just as important as exercise during this time. I'll make sure to listen to my body and not push myself too hard.

I really appreciate all the helpful tips and advice you've shared with me today. You've been an amazing conversational partner, and I feel so much more empowered to take control of my recovery.

If I do have any more questions or need further guidance, I won't hesitate to reach out. Thank you again for your time, kindness, and expertise. You're making a big difference in my life!
